name: Castle Fight (soapmc16)
description:
Hello! 

This is a game we created for our final project. We all think this is fun to play and we wish you have a good time playing it. Please leave comments so we can make this game better! 

Notice: the background music is credited to : Green Crops , Nintendo FC.  

Game development team: 

Yu Qiao - Art, Game design

Jiakai Chen - Game design, UI Programming

Kunyu Wang - Game & system design, Gameplay programming

Zhengbang Wang - Gameplay programming, Game design
